short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all images on a given page with pictures of Ryan Gosling. HEY GIRL!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly change all images on any given webpage to America's Sweetheart RYAN GOSLING!
Install the extension, click the heart and watch the magic happen!
